version_description:
- Meet new hero Mabyn, the mad jester with a jack in the box
- Fight the Mummy in 10 New Sunstorm Sands levels
- Face the Lich in 10 new Fjordgaard challenge levels
- Unlocked stories and level 2 skills for Sethos, Lancelot and Hogan. All heroes can level up to 25
- New item Meteor that vaporizes enemies and spawns two golems
- Fight with a blessed hero with buffed power in tournament
- Free tournament retry by watching opt-in ads
- Raid ticket: Instant complete endless mode and collect rewards
- Update: fix some network issue

- Gold and Platinum league can watch ads to get 2 extra keys per day! Once reached Diamond league, you can collect 4 keys per day in the store without watching ads!
- Meteor can be used in tournament for Diamond league and above players!
- Enjoy a blessed hero in each week’s tournament with increased health, attack, and spell damage
- Optimized performance
- Rebalanced Sethos 2nd story level

- New 10 Shattered Realm levels featuring new game play the Shrine Defense and Lich Hunt world
- Enjoy level 2 skills and hero stories of Mabyn and Obsidian
- Display best scores for each tournament league
- Necromancer towers now have 2 troops!

- 开放游乐场，里面有全新独特的塔防玩法，还可以领奖哦！
- 解锁神龙和正宗的英雄故事，升级二级技能！
- 第三世界旭风沙漠的关卡调整了难度！
- 第四世界会在十月底推出！

- Open Arcade mode, a marketplace full of maps each with unique mechanics
- Enjoy hero stories of Smoulder and Masamune and upgrade their skills to level 2
- Rebalanced Sunstorm Sands levels
- World 4 the Sky Kingdom will be coming in late October!

- Open World 4 - Caelum Cloudveil. Drive out the Dark Magic and rule this Magical Realm in the Sky.
- Welcome new hero Yan the Time Mage into the Kingdom!
- Enjoy Champion Fee and Efrigid awarded to Grandmasters in Season 2
- Tournament Season 3 starts!
- Improved hero touch and drag experience

- Open World 4 - Caelum Cloudveil. Drive out the Dark Magic and rule this Magical Realm in the Sky.
- Welcome new hero Yan the Time Mage into the Kingdom!
- Enjoy Champion Fee and Efrigid awarded to Grandmasters in Season 2
- Tournament Season 3 starts!
- Improved hero touch and drag experience
- Bug fixes

开放世界4 - 星空云纱。 抵御黑魔法，统治这个神奇的天空世界
来自星空云纱的女巫师 - 嫣，出场了
在锦标赛第二赛中获得塔防宗师的玩家，将获得冠军菲和冠军艾冰
锦标赛第3赛季开始！

Bug 修复：
- 修复扩展文件问题
- 解锁世界4问题
*我们添加了存储权限以更好地支持扩展文件
*我们尊重您的隐私，不得访问您的个人档案

10 New levels of World 3. Face the Pharaoh Boss in Pharaoh’s Finale.
Added graphics setting
世界4的10个新关卡。这一次，英雄们不得不直面来自虚空的恐怖。

- 世界4的10个新关卡。这一次，英雄们不得不直面来自虚空的恐怖
- bug 修复

Divine Star Holiday Event will begin on December 5th!
Win gift boxes and collect marvelous holiday hero skins!

Divine Star Holiday Event will begin on December 5th!
Win gift boxes and collect marvelous holiday hero skins!
Bug fixes

- Open World 5 - Tartarus. Help the Dwarves reclaim their lost kingdom from living plants and dark elves!
- Welcome new hero Leif Redbeard the Dwarven Blacksmith into the Kingdom!
- Tournament enemies go rage when the wave takes too long
- Narlax void teleport now has a slightly longer cooldown
- Elixir mine maximum level raised to level 8
- Hero maximum level raised to 30 after finishing world 4
- Endless mode difficulties continue to rise after 20 minutes now

- 10 new levels of world 4. A bizarre adventure into the void.
- Welcome new hero Narlax the void lord!
- Defend your goddess in the new arcade mode!

- 10 new levels of world 3 challenge! Defeat Scarath and his swarm!
- Yan’s level 2 skills are available now!
- Fix Narlax’ orb disappear bug
- Fix Narlax’ crystal orb may not vanish after Narlax revive bug
- Fix Narlax’ orb stack damage every time Narlax revives
- Fix the bug that a creep may become immortal if teleported by Yan and wizard tower and at the same time being void pulled by Narlax
- Sethos’ burrow strike now stun and damage all the enemy on his path instead of just damaging them
- Sethos’ reflect now deals extra physical damage equal to his attack
- Hero summon creep remake, their statics are now related to their summoner instead of fixed value, which means they also become stronger as the hero level up!

- 锦标赛第4季开始！
- 第三季冠军获得奥西迪恩和魔娜造型奖励！
世界4裡的10个新关卡。英雄们觉得找到了虚空的出路。但，会带他们前往哪裡呢？

Brand new world 3 endless mode level.
Brand new world 4 tournament maps.
Various bug fixes.

- Open World 5 - Tartarus. Help the Dwarves reclaim their lost kingdom from living plants and dark elves!
- Welcome new hero Leif Redbeard the Dwarven Blacksmith into the Kingdom!
- Tournament enemies go rage when the wave takes too long
- Narlax void teleport now has a slightly longer cooldown
- Elixir mine maximum level raised to level 8
- Hero maximum level raised to 30 after finishing world 4
- Endless mode difficulties continue to rise after 20 minutes now

- Tournament season 5 starts!
- Enjoy season 4 champion skin rewards!
- Tournament bosses now do AoE melee attack, nerf Yan boss.
- Various bug fixes.

- 10 new levels of world 5. Face Caldera, the King of Lava!
- Drag to cast hero abilities can be turned on in the options menu after finishing world 2

- Hero rank system
- Realm siege mode

- Tournament mechanism update. The ranking is now based on how many enemies you killed and how quickly you killed them.
- In-game Mailbox.
- Better iPhone X support.

- 10 New levels of Tartarus Tunnels. Our heroes will face the frenzied War Ents of Dark Elf design.
- World 5 balance: Dwarf Warrior Tower level 1 price decreased. Snipe, Rocket Attack and Bombing Run damages decreased.
- Realm Siege difficulty reduced for latter levels.
- Hero Camp rating bars is now more accurately and increases while ranking up.
Bug fixes

- Tournament season 6 begins! Enjoy new champion skins!
- New hero Caldera has arrived in Realm Defense! Be prepared for the Caldera’s Eruption event, win great rewards, get Caldera and rank him up with the event special price!
- Fixed world 4 fire and ice elementals to give gold and kill count when suicide.
- Fixed Rank 6 Masamune’s 'Youtou' shadow clones to have 'Youtou' too.
- Rank 6 Fee’s blackhole now deals damage.

- 10 new levels of Tartarus Tunnels.
- New awakenings of 3 heroes, Smoulder, Efrigid and Obsidian.
Bug fixes

- World 4 endless mode
- Bug fixes
Bug fixes

- Connie's Awakening added
- Experience a 7 day long story driven event, starting soon
- Bug Fixes and Optimizations

- The Death Knight boss has been added to World 1 tournaments
- Five new World 1 tournament levels have been added
- Revised balance of some tournament enemies
- Origami Mages no longer spawn cranes while charmed
- Void Delusion: Negative no longer affects the boss in Level 190
- Caldera's health is now constant
- Fixed barracks troops' pathing
- New font for Polish and Turkish

- New Epic Skins for Sethos, Masamune, and Obsidian are available for purchase with Tournament Coins in the Tournament Shop
- Realm Siege UI has been improved
- Bug Fixes

- Added New Reward for competing in Tournament: Tournament Coins
- Use Tournament Coins to unlock worlds or unlock skins for your favorite Heroes
- Skin Selector in Hero Camp now scrolls

- Narlax Awakening with new Delusion talents. Make your choice between the two incompatible talents!
- Added 3 new Achievements for using Tappables
- Now you have the option to watch an ad to skip Daily Challenges
- Fixed the bug where some summoned skeletons refused to get enraged by Rank 6 Hogan

- Purchases can now be restored by player
- Hogan Awakening is now available!
- Tournament Entries ticket prices now stop increasing at 100 gems
- Bug Fixes

- 新英雄愛月桜降临传奇塔防！参加愛月桜的樱花之月活动，觉醒愛月桜并获得各种奖励！
- 添加了对波兰语和越南语的支持（测试中）
- 烈焰神龙觉醒五添加了炼狱吐息天赋
- 奥西迪恩黑岩陨星爆现在会眩晕敌人

- Season 6 is to ending this week! GMs will get new champion skins!
- Increased Azura’s Sakura Blessing healing amount.
- Increased Azura’s normal attack damage gain per rank and per level.
- Added a new talent 'Ageless' for Azura.
- Fixed the bug where many charmed enemies don’t do AOE damage and apply aura effects correctly. Slightly decrease to raged charmed enemies’ damage in later game of tournament.
- Obsidian now casts Obsidian Meteor without jumping to position.
- Fixed Yan’s attack and Azura’s heal sound effects.

- Season 7 Begins! World 5 Tournament maps now available!
- You can now watch Ads to accelerate forging!
- Added a confirmation UI when purchasing heroes.
- Fixed the bug where Azura was attacking charmed enemies
- Fixed the bug where Charm wasn’t targeting exactly the 2 enemies in the center.

- World 5 Endless level is now available
- Tournament Entries now refresh using UTC time instead of local time
- Bug Fix

- World 5 Endless level is now available
- Tournament Entries now refresh using UTC time instead of local time
- Bug Fix

- Purchases can now be restored by player
- Hogan Awakening is now available!
- Tournament Entries ticket prices now stop increasing at 100 gems
- Bug Fixes

- World 6 Now Available! Say hello to Okakoku! A country of Cherry Blossoms, Mountains, and Seas besieged by hidden evils! Become an Honorable Warrior and defend this new realm.
- 10 New Levels available now! As usual, more coming soon.
- 4 New Tower types to try out! Taiko, Shrine, Crossbow and Samurai!
- New Branching Tower Upgrades Mechanic
- Bug Fixes

- World 6 Now Available! Say hello to Okakoku! A country of Cherry Blossoms, Mountains, and Seas besieged by hidden evils! Become an Honorable Warrior and defend this new realm.
- 10 New Levels available now! As usual, more coming soon.
- 4 New Tower types to try out! Taiko, Shrine, Crossbow and Samurai!
- New Branching Tower Upgrades Mechanic
- Bug Fixes

- The Divine Star Festival Event arrives! Collect Divine Stars and get grand rewards!
- Happy Winter Holidays! Enjoy adding Candy Queen Efrigid and Gingerbread Caldera holiday exclusive skins to your collection, along with the four holiday skins from last year!
- Bug Fixes

- The Divine Star Festival Event arrives! Collect Divine Stars and get grand rewards!
- Happy Winter Holidays! Enjoy adding Candy Queen Efrigid and Gingerbread Caldera holiday exclusive skins to your collection, along with the four holiday skins from last year!
- Bug Fixes
Security Updates
Security Updates

- New hero Raida has arrived in Realm Defense! Be prepared for the Lunar New Year event, win great rewards, get Raida and rank him up with the special event price!
- Azura is now available for purchase, Azura hero tokens are now available in Realm Siege.
- Slight balancing of World 6 Shuriken Tower damage.

- Raida gains a new talent: Tank Up
- Raida's Rank 5 Talent now provides 100% damage resistance while he's charging
- Bug Fixes

- Lunar New Year Event ends on the 18th Feb (00:00 UTC), please remember to forge your Oni Boxes before then!
- Tournament Season 7 ends on Feb 24, 2019!
- Grandmasters shall receive unique 'Champion' hero skins based on final Grandmaster rankings!

- Lunar New Year Event ends on the 18th Feb (00:00 UTC), please remember to forge your Oni Boxes before then!
- Tournament Season 7 ends on Feb 24, 2019!
- Grandmasters shall receive unique 'Champion' hero skins based on final Grandmaster rankings!

- Season 8 Begins! Enjoy the new Champion Skins!
- New Awakenings for 2 heroes: Sethos and Helios
- Slight adjustment the rage buff of Azura’s Charm in late game of tournament
- Add levels 9 and 10 Elixir Mine
- Add hero levels 31 to 35

- Gear up for the most intense Boss Fight we've ever created for Realm Defense; join Raida and confront his Oni-god brother Raijin!
- 10 all new action packed World 6 levels
- Discover new hidden secrets to tap in these levels that can give you a hand in battle
- Level 9 and 10 Elixir mine production rates increased
- Lowered gem cost of forge acceleration
- Players can buy 5 Realm Siege Keys per day and hold a maximum of 10
- Add a new forgeable item: Raid Ticket
- World 6 Tower Balancing: Shuriken Tower’s multi-shot target count decreased from 3 to 2, Heavy Taiko tower’s damage slightly decreased

- Gear up for the most intense Boss Fight we've ever created for Realm Defense; join Raida and confront his Oni-god brother Raijin!
- 10 new World 6 levels
- Discover new hidden secrets in these levels
- Level 9 and 10 Elixir mine rates increased
- Lowered gem cost of Forge acceleration
- 5 Realm Siege Keys per day and can hold a maximum of 10
- New forgeable item: Raid Ticket
- World 6 Tower Balance: Shuriken’s multi-shot targets decreased from 3 to 2, Heavy Taiko’s damage slightly decreased

- Added New Reward for competing in Tournament: Tournament Coins
- Use Tournament Coins to unlock worlds or unlock skins for your favorite Heroes
- Skin Selector in Hero Camp now scrolls

- Achievements! An all new way to earn Gems. Progress can be viewed in the Achievements List on the World Map
- New power item! Gold Boost is now available to be crafted in the Forge
- Fixed a bug where units spawned by Charmed units wouldn’t move

- Discover new hidden secrets throughout Worlds 1 and 2 to give you a hand in battle
- Fixed bugs where some Achievements were not updating correctly

- Narlax Awakening with new Delusion talents. Make your choice between the two incompatible talents!
- Added 3 new Achievements for using Tappables
- Now you have the option to watch an ad to skip Daily Challenges
- Fixed the bug where some summoned skeletons refused to get enraged by Rank 6 Hogan

- New hero Koizuul is Splashing down in Realm Defense! Prepare for a new Event where you’ll choose between special randomized bonuses to help fight back waves of enemies! Win great rewards, get Koizuul and rank them up with the special event price!
- Raida is now available for purchase, Raida hero tokens are now available in Realm Siege.
- Fix the bug that some Narlax Rank 5 has Positive talent already.

- New Epic Skins for Sethos, Masamune, and Obsidian are available for purchase with Tournament Coins in the Tournament Shop
- Realm Siege UI has been improved
- Bug Fixes

- Save the River Guardian from a terrible sickness in a dire boss fight
- 10 all new World 6 levels: Protect a humble fisherman in desperate need of a vacation
- Added a new Awakening for Leif
- Bug Fixes

- The Death Knight boss has been added to World 1 tournaments
- Five new World 1 tournament levels have been added
- Revised balance of some tournament enemies
- Origami Mages no longer spawn cranes while charmed
- Void Delusion: Negative no longer affects the boss in Level 190
- Caldera's health is now constant
- Fixed barracks troops' pathing
- New font for Polish and Turkish

- Five New World 2 Tournament levels added
- Fixed one of Koizuul's Dragon Form Animations
- Fixed bug with Projectile visibility for World 6 Crossbow Towers

- Five New World 2 Tournament levels added
- Fixed one of Koizuul's Dragon Form Animations
- Fixed bug with Projectile visibility for World 6 Crossbow Towers

- Connie's Awakening added
- Experience a 7 day long story driven event, starting soon
- Bug Fixes and Optimizations
